title: Bug 104630: Column icons are not displayed when connecting to derby database
description: When connecting to a derby database, the column icons are not visible.
OB: When I connect to a derby database, the column icons do not show up.
EB: When I connect to a derby database, the column icons should be visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the database connection dialog. 
2. Enter the necessary details to connect to a derby database. 
3. Once connected, navigate to the table view. 
4. Observe that the column icons are missing.
